testcase.name: DBA.FR75
testcase.description: DBA.FR75: The company must provide information on the number of employees. The rule is activated if personnel costs (fsa:EmployeeBenefitsExpense) or salaries (fsa:WagesAndSalaries) are greater than DKK 200,000, and no number of employees (fsa:AverageNumberOfEmployees) has been specified.
